Product Description: The Villa Greek Key Urn is meticulously crafted from Italian terracotta clay. Artisans hand-pack the clay into a mold through a process called Calco. The urn is then transferred to a kiln and fired at 950 degrees, resulting in a beautiful piece that can grace your space both indoors and outdoors, bringing timeless elegance to any setting.
